column5: A week or so ago I ordered myself a new toy for Christmas. It came in to the store on Christmas Eve but I found out too late to go pick it up. I went in today to get it.  I finally got myself one of them HD action cam thingies so I can get some kick donkey video and not worry about water and other nasty environmental stuff. Got a great deal online from the Source on this 1080 HD Extreme HD cam with all kinds of mounts, 2 batteries and micro HD card. It was on sale for $100 of @ only $129 so really couldn't go wrong. Now to figure out where to put mounts on my boats and sled.
I'll have to google this, I almost pulled the trigger on a go pro but @300 bucks I could get alot more bang for my buck!!

definitely on a ski of the sled...or if it has wide angle ...right on the front bumper if its possible.....hurry up and take it for a test run...love to see the results  just read the link you posted....definitely has wide angle...i think framed so you get both skis in the video and go for a scenic tour would be awesome...
Hurry Dave,20mega pixels wow,let's get a look at it !!
Ain't gonna happen today boys. She's a balmy -40 with -52 wind chill. Wind chill at sledding speed is absolute zero!!!! Tuesday looks to be the warm day @ -29, -35 wind chill.
Even the nitrogen charged  camera will freeze at them temps. lol    Art
